fullDescription.intro: Hierarchically computes the centroid of a region and divides it into four new subregions. For each of these subregions the centroid gets calculated again. The resulting feature vector consists of the x and y values of the centroids.
fullDescription.option: Defines how many centroids should be calculated. Careful as the number of centroids rises exponentially.
If white should be used as the background color.

ports.inPort: The binary images for which the AHGC feature should be calculated.
